arts.sum: Maximilian Arnold (3.) gave Wolfsburg an early lead, but Mainz fought back through Jae-sung Lee (37.) and Dominik Kohr (40.) before halftime. The MEWA Arena played host to a crucial encounter in the race for European qualification as Mainz welcomed Wolfsburg.

arts.ttl: Mainz and Wolfsburg winless in five after entertaining draw
arts.sum: Wolfsburg scored in the opening and ending chapters of the game to end their losing streak with a 2-2 draw away at Mainz.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg rekindle interest in Wolves striker Fabio Silva
arts.sum: Sky Germany's Florian Plettenberg reports that VfL Wolfsburg are also interested in Wolverhampton Wanderers striker Fabio Silva.

arts.ttl: Mainz interested in bringing Jonjoe Kenny back to the Bundesliga
arts.sum: Germany's main sporting tabloid reports that FSV Mainz 05 are considering picking up Hertha BSC fullback Jonjoe Kenny.

arts.ttl: 1. FSV Mainz 05 vs. VfL Wolfsburg preview: Two teams looking to end inconsistent records
arts.sum: 1. FSV Mainz 05 (13-7-9, 5th) are in a European spot, but look to end their four-match winless run against VfL Wolfsburg (10-8-11, 12th), who have not won in five.

arts.ttl: Preview: Mainz 05 vs. Wolfsburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Mainz 05 and Wolfsburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
